Package com.davidbracewell.conversion

Classes to convert between arbitrary types.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ArrayConverter<T>
    Converts objects to arrays of objects
    Cast
    A collection of static methods making casting from one type to another a bit easier.
    CollectionConverter
    Converts objects to collections, iterators, and iterables
    CommonTypeConverter
    Functions for converting objects to common types in Java e.g.
    Convert
    The type Convert.
    EnumConverter<T extends Enum<T>>
    Converts objects into an enum value.
    IOConverter
    Functions for converting objects into IO related objects
    MapConverter<K,V,T extends Map<K,V>>
    Converts an Object to a Map.
    NewObjectConverter<T>
    Converter that tries to create a new object from the object it is given.
    NumberConverter
    Functions for converting objects into Numbers and Boolean
    PrimitiveArrayConverter
    The type Primitive array converter.
    Val
    Wraps an object allowing conversion into other formats.

Package com.davidbracewell.conversion Description
